entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
